amendment.description: Amendment sought to ensure minors are not punished as sex offenders.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in part B of House Report 115-152 to ensure minors are not punished as sex offenders.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A002) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 180 - 238 (Roll no. 283).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A002) pursuant to the rule.
